content.raw:
`gazebo --verbose` does not show any errors.

So I also made a test SDF model ([collada_test](https://github.com/skohlbr/gazebo_issue_1728/tree/master/collada_test)) and spawned it into the same scenario as my robot. As visible in the screenshot, the exact same model gets colored correctly when loaded as part of a SDF, but doesn't when loaded as part of a URDF. It thus seems that at some point during the conversion from URDF to SDF the color information is lost (?).

![collada_issue_comparison.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1666148570-collada_issue_comparison.jpg)
content.html:
gazebo --verbose does not show any errors.

So I also made a test SDF model (collada_test) and spawned it into the same scenario as my robot. As visible in the screenshot, the exact same model gets colored correctly when loaded as part of a SDF, but doesn't when loaded as part of a URDF. It thus seems that at some point during the conversion from URDF to SDF the color information is lost (?).
